data.description: Class for ListDB pdb database files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This Module extends the collection of PalmOS applications that are
    supported by the Palm::PDB framework. As ListDB is a distinct tool
    for itself, a separat sub-class is consistent within Palm::PDB.
    (Similar to the standard app classes Palm::Address, Palm::Memo
    etc...)
